author: Jeffrey Trinker
text:
Does anyone work for a city that owns and operates its own street sweeping truck?  We currently contract for street sweeping service, but there has bee some interest expressed in doing it in-house.
I need to develop some cost comparisons for contracting for service versus the initial and ongoing costs associated with owning and operating a street sweeping truck.  I have thought of the following costs, but please let me know if there are any I am forgetting:

Initial cost of the vehicle
Salary and benefits of employee operator
Training and certifications necessary for the operator
Annual maintenance costs
Insurance costs

I'd appreciate any data or cost that could be shared, whether broken down or the total budgeted amount for the program.
Thanks in advance.
title: Costs of in-house street sweeping program?
